confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

financials.title: Financials & Tax
kpis.gmv.desc: The total value of all successful transactions processed through the platform.
kpis.accruedCoachEarnings.desc: The total amount owed to coaches from completed transactions, but not yet paid out.
kpis.successfulTransactions.desc: The total count of successfully completed payments on the platform.
kpis.atv.desc: The average value per transaction (Gross Merchandise Volume / Number of Transactions).
kpis.totalCoachPayouts.desc: The total amount that has already been paid out to coaches.
kpis.totalCustomerRefunds.desc: The total amount that has been refunded to customers.
kpis.grossPlatformRevenue.desc: The total fees collected by the platform before any costs are deducted.
kpis.paymentProcessingFees.desc: The fees charged by payment providers (e.g., Stripe) for processing transactions.
kpis.platformVatLiability.desc: The VAT collected on platform fees, which is owed to tax authorities.
kpis.netPlatformRevenue.desc: The platform's actual profit after deducting payment processing fees. Calculated as: Gross Platform Fees - Payment Processing Fees.
kpis.newUserSignups.desc: The number of new users (clients and coaches) who registered on the platform.
kpis.pendingApps.desc: The number of coach applications awaiting review and approval.
kpis.totalSessionsBooked.desc: The total number of sessions booked by clients (does not include availability blocks).
kpis.completedSessions.desc: The number of sessions that were successfully completed and marked as 'completed'.
kpis.totalEnrollments.desc: The total number of enrollments in programs or courses.
kpis.disputes.desc: The number of payments challenged by customers via their payment provider.
kpis.flaggedReviews.desc: The number of reviews that have been flagged for moderation.
kpis.openSupportTickets.desc: The number of support tickets that are currently open and require a response.
kpis.groups.marketplaceActivityDesc: Overall economic activity on the platform.
kpis.groups.platformProfitabilityDesc: The financial health of your business.
kpis.groups.cashFlowDesc: Movement of money in and out of the platform.

financials.disputeResolvedRefundSuccess: Dispute closed and refund successfully initiated.

userManagement.godMode.title: God Mode Actions
userManagement.suspendConfirmDesc: This will prevent the user from logging in. Please provide a reason.
userManagement.suspendReasonPlaceholder: e.g. Terms of Service violation, abusive behavior
userManagement.reactivateConfirmDesc: Are you sure you want to reactivate this account?
userManagement.changeRoleDesc: Select a new role for this user.
userManagement.resetPasswordConfirmDesc: This will send a password reset link to the user's email. Provide a reason for this action.
userManagement.passwordResetReasonPlaceh: e.g. User requested reset via support chat.
userManagement.verifyEmailConfirmDesc: This will manually mark the user's email as verified. Provide a reason for this action.
userManagement.verifyEmailReasonPlacehol: e.g. User confirmed email ownership via alternate channel.
userManagement.impersonateConfirmDesc: Impersonating a user lets you see the platform as they do. All actions will be logged. Provide a reason.
userManagement.impersonateReasonPlacehol: e.g. Debugging user-reported issue, assisting with setup
userManagement.deleteConfirmDesc: This action is irreversible. All of the user's data, including sessions and financial records, will be queued for permanent deletion. To proceed, type the user's full name:
userManagement.actions.deleteSuccess: User deletion process has been initiated.
userManagement.impersonateReasonRequired: A reason is required to impersonate a user.
userManagement.actions.passwordResetSucc: Password reset email has been initiated for the user.
userManagement.actions.verifyEmailSucces: User email has been manually verified.
userManagement.noUsersFound: No users found matching your criteria.
userManagement.hasActiveDispute: User has an active payment dispute.

system.title: System Management
appeal.title: Appeal a Decision
appeal.description: Review the details of the moderation decision and submit an appeal if you believe an error was made.
appeal.formDescription: Please explain why you believe this decision was in error. Provide as much detail as possible. Our team will review your appeal and respond via a new support ticket.
appeal.reasonRequired: A reason for the appeal is required.
appeal.submitSuccess: Your appeal has been submitted as ticket #{{ticketId}}.
report_program_desc: Help us understand the problem. Why are you reporting this program?
report_user_desc: Help us understand the problem. What's going on with this user?
report_review_desc: Help us understand the problem. Why are you reporting this review?
reportSubmittedSuccess: Thanks for your report. Our team will review it shortly.
notifications.user_account_warning.title: Official Warning On Your Account
notifications.user_account_warning.messa: This is an official warning ({{warning_count}} of 2) for activity that violates our community guidelines on **{{flag_reason_translation}}**. Any more violations may lead to your account being suspended. We recommend you review our community guidelines to avoid future issues.
notifications.user_content_hidden.title: Your Content Was Hidden
notifications.user_content_hidden.messag: A piece of your content ("{{truncated_review_comment}}") was hidden because it violates our policy on **{{flag_reason_translation}}**. Please review our community guidelines. If you believe this was a mistake, you can [appeal the decision](appeal).
notifications.user_account_suspended.mes: Your account has been {{suspension_type}} suspended due to repeated or severe violations of our policy on **{{flag_reason_translation}}**. The suspension will last for {{suspension_duration}}. If you believe this was a mistake, you can [appeal the decision](appeal).
notifications.report_actioned.title: Thanks for your report
notifications.report_actioned.message: We've taken action based on your report. Your help keeps our community safe.
notifications.report_dismissed.title: Update on your report
notifications.report_dismissed.message: After review, we found the content you reported doesn't violate our community guidelines. We still appreciate you taking the time to help us out.

feeOverride.title: Set Platform Fee Override
feeOverride.description: Grant special platform fee terms for
feeOverride.panelDescription: Manage the special terms for this coach.
feeOverride.removeConfirmDesc: This will restore the standard platform fees for all of this coach's future transactions. This action cannot be undone.
feeOverride.noActiveOverride: There is no platform fee override currently active for this coach.
feeOverride.expiredInfo: A previous fee override for this coach has expired.

platform.assetCleanupDesc: Review assets that have been identified as potentially orphaned. Select assets and delete them to free up storage space.
